thread.section_title: Travelodge London Stratford - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely staff
thread.title_full: Lovely staff - Review of Travelodge London Stratford, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: lelleray
title: Lovely staff
text:
We stayed here as a group of 6 adults in 2 family rooms to see my sister perform at the Stratford Arts Theatre as it is only a 10 minute walk to the theatre from the hotel. The hotel itself was clean and was quiet in the evenings. We had a few drinks in the evening at the bar which was reasonably priced for London and the bar staff were very friendly. The next morning, we decided we would like to have continental breakfast and when we went to pay the chap said that he would only charge us for 5 and as it was Mother's Day we could all upgrade to full cooked breakfast free of charge (if we had a photo with the staff for the newsletter). The breakfast selection itself was good and replenished quickly.
Would recommend for cheap and cheerful accommodation near to the theatre, Westfield Shopping Centre and the Olympic Park
